snippet: The last time Alex Rodriguez had hip surgery, in 2009, the Yankees responded by winning a championship. Can history repeat itself?
abstract: Tyler Kepner On Baseball column notes that every time New York Yankees third baseman Alex Rodriguez has hip surgery, team responds by winning the World Series; holds that Rodriguez's statistics have declined every year since 2007, and latest surgery can at best restore only a portion of his past greatness.
lead_paragraph: The last time Alex Rodriguez had hip surgery, in 2009, the Yankees responded by winning a championship. Can history repeat itself?

headline.seo: Surgery for A-Rod, Torment for Yankees
headline.main: Surgery for Rodriguez, Resignation for Yankees
headline.print_headline: Surgery for Rodriguez, Resignation for Yankees
